about_the_game:
Devices Company Tycoon Inc: Design, Build, Conquer

Become a titan of the tech industry in Devices Company Tycoon Inc, a unique business simulation where you design, develop, and dominate the global market.


Key Features:

Unleash Your Creativity: Craft cutting-edge devices, from smartphones and tablets to laptops, smartwatches, headphones, TVs, operating systems, and even custom processors.


Build Your Dream Team: Recruit top talent worldwide – visionary designers, brilliant programmers, and skilled engineers – to bring your innovative ideas to life.

Customize Everything: Dive into a detailed device editor with countless parameters to tweak. Choose the size, color, screen, processor, graphics card, speakers, packaging, and much more to create truly unique products.


Listen to Your Customers: Gather feedback from early adopters and refine your devices to achieve the highest ratings and drive sales through the roof.


Expand Your Empire: Upgrade and customize offices for your growing team. Host product presentations, master marketing strategies, monitor competitor rankings, open retail stores worldwide, negotiate lucrative deals, and acquire rival companies.

Immersive Graphics and Interface: Enjoy high-quality visuals and an intuitive interface that make managing your tech empire both visually appealing and user-friendly.

Dynamic Market Environment: Navigate a constantly changing market landscape. Adapt to new trends, overcome challenges, and seize opportunities to stay ahead of the competition.

Modding Support: Create and share your own custom content, from new devices and components to unique scenarios and challenges.

Conquer the Market: Your journey to tech dominance awaits. Pre-order now and start your journey to tech dominance!

Become a titan of the tech industry in Devices Company Tycoon Inc, a unique business simulation where you design, develop, and dominate the global market.


Key Features:

Conquer the Market: Your journey to tech dominance awaits. Pre-order now and start your journey to tech dominance!
name: Devices Company Tycoon Inc

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT420
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-550
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Step into "Devices Company Tycoon Inc"! Lead your tech company to greatness by creating innovative devices like smartphones, laptops, and more. Customize every detail, hire top talent, and expand globally. Host product launches, study market trends, and outshine competitors. Enjoy the game!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, French, German, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Japanese
